titles.title: NACIE Improvement Act
NACIE Improvement Act
National Advisory Council on Indian Education Improvement Act
NACIE Improvement Act
National Advisory Council on Indian Education Improvement Act
NACIE Improvement Act
National Advisory Council on Indian Education Improvement Act
A bill to ensure that the National Advisory Council on Indian Education includes at least 1 member who is the president of a Tribal College or University.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Ms. Foxx moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 5355.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
National Advisory Council on Indian Education Improvement Act or the NACIE Improvement Act
This act requires the President to ensure that the National Advisory Council on Indian Education includes at least one member who is the president of a tribal college or university.
